meanings.sent1: After a few sips of wine, she felt a bit tipsy.
meanings.sent2: He was tipsy after celebrating his birthday with friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked tipsy trying to walk in a straight line.
meanings.sent4: The tipsy clouds seemed to stumble across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The tipsiness of the clown made his performance even funnier.

meanings.definition: The state of being slightly intoxicated or drunk.
meanings.sent1: Her tipsiness was evident from her giggles and unsteady steps.
meanings.sent2: The tipsiness of the party guests added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The tipsiness of the penguin waddling around the ice rink was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The tipsiness of the old building gave it a charming, slightly off-kilter appearance.
meanings.sent5: The tipsiness of the tree branches in the wind made them look like dancing partners.
